name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a highly skilled Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in utilizing **Java**, **Spring**, **JPA**, **JDBC**, **Spring Data**, and **JUnit** to develop resilient backend solutions. My front-end development expertise includes **Angular** and integrating modern tools such as **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, and **CI/CD** practices to ensure efficient deployment pipelines. I am adept in using various databases like **MariaDB**, **PostgreSQL**, and **MySQL**, along with message brokers like **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **JMS**, to create robust and scalable applications.
I have reinforced enterprise systems employing microservices architecture and event-driven methodologies while managing configurations with **Maven** and **Yarn**. Additionally, my experience with testing tools like **Cypress** and **Jest** enhances my capability to deliver high-quality software products. I bring comprehensive knowledge of cloud services such as **Azure** for hosting and monitoring applications using **Grafana** and **Prometheus**.
My previous roles involved driving the development of applications adhering to compliance standards, with an emphasis on secure coding practices. I possess a strong understanding of observability tools like **OpenTracing** and **Jaeger**, ensuring performance optimization throughout the software lifecycle. My innovative approach is complemented by a consistent track record in utilizing machine learning pipelines and serving models in production environments.
